title: JBoss EAP 8 Top 10 New Features
content: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) 8.0 is now available. The new major release introduces several new features and enhancements to enhance your application development and deployment experience. In this tutorial, we will explore these new features and learn how to leverage them effectively. JBoss EAP 8 includes several new features and applies to ...  The post appeared first on .
